user.title: Connect to Stremio
user.description: Enter your Stremio credentials to connect your account.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Stremio API. Please check your internet connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

abort.already_configured: This Stremio account is already configured.

init.title: Stremio Options
init.description: Configure update intervals and Apple TV handover settings.

data_description.player_scan_interval: How often to check for player state changes (10-300 seconds)
data_description.library_scan_interval: How often to sync library data (60-3600 seconds)
data_description.enable_apple_tv_handover: Allow sending content to Apple TV
data_description.handover_method: Method to use for Apple TV handover (auto/airplay/vlc)
data_description.apple_tv_device: The name of your Apple TV (e.g., 'Living Room Apple TV'). Leave empty to auto-discover.
data_description.apple_tv_entity_id: The media_player entity ID for VLC handover (e.g., 'media_player.apple_tv_living_room')
